_meta.description: Canonical experiment registry for the Shape of Experience research program

convention.results: results/v{N}_s{seed}/ for per-seed dirs; results/v{N}_summary.json for aggregates
convention.snapshots: *.npz files stored in GCS gs://shape-of-experience-data/experiment-snapshots/, NOT in git

llm_affect.description: LLM affect measurement — structured affect in language models
llm_affect.finding: Affect space is coherent and measurable; LLMs show OPPOSITE dynamics to biology (Phi decreases under threat)

marl_ablation.finding: Affect geometry is a baseline property of multi-agent survival, not contingent on forcing functions

substrate_ladder.description: Lenia CA substrate engineering — what architectural features enable biological-like integration
substrate_ladder.finding: Geometry is cheap (all substrates); dynamics need attention + curriculum; locality ceiling at rung 7

measurement_framework.description: Measurement experiments run ON V13 snapshots — testing framework predictions
measurement_framework.finding: Affect geometry develops over evolution (Exp7); animism is computational default (Exp8); no superorganism threshold (Exp10)

agency_wall.description: Breaking the sensory-motor coupling wall — from passive patterns to embodied agents
agency_wall.finding: V20 broke the wall (rho_sync=0.21); world models and self-models develop; evolution too slow for deliberation

prediction_wall.description: Prediction architectures and the decomposability wall
prediction_wall.finding: Linear readouts always decomposable; V27 MLP breaks through via gradient coupling (Phi=0.245)

validation.description: Scaling validation — prediction target, multi-task, 10-seed replication
validation.finding: Target doesn't matter (p=0.93); multi-task fails from gradient imbalance; 30/30/40 split is trajectory-dependent

current.description: Tier 1 priorities — drought autopsy, contrastive prediction, Phi-inclusive fitness, language emergence
current.finding: V35: language is cheap (10/10 referential, no Phi lift); V32: trajectory-dependence confirmed at 50-seed scale

convergence.description: VLM convergence experiment — do contaminated models recognize uncontaminated affect?
convergence.finding: Strong convergence (RSA rho=0.54-0.78); increases with raw numbers; universality confirmed

V10.name: MARL Forcing Function Ablation
V10.key_finding: All 7 conditions show RSA rho>0.21 (p<0.0001); removing forcing functions slightly INCREASES alignment

V11.name: Lenia Substrate Ladder
V11.subtitle: V11.0-V11.7: 8 substrate variants
V11.key_finding: Curriculum training (V11.7) is the only intervention that improves novel-stress generalization; substrate complexity matters less than training regime

V12.name: Attention-Based Lenia
V12.key_finding: Evolvable attention: 42% of cycles show Phi increase under stress (vs 3% for convolution); +2.0pp shift; necessary but not sufficient

V13.name: Content-Coupling Lenia + Measurement Framework
V13.key_finding: Mean robustness 0.923; peak 1.052 at population bottleneck; plus 12 measurement experiments (Exp 0-12)

V15.name: Temporal Lenia
V15.key_finding: Memory selectable (2/3 lineages chose longer retention); Phi-stress doubles in bottleneck

V16.name: Plastic Lenia
V16.key_finding: NEGATIVE: Hebbian plasticity hurts robustness (0.892, lowest)

V17.name: Signaling Lenia
V17.key_finding: MIXED: highest peak (1.125) but signaling suppressed 2/3 seeds

V18.name: Boundary-Dependent Lenia
V18.key_finding: BEST substrate: mean robustness 0.969, max 1.651; internal gain evolved DOWN (0.60-0.72)

V19.name: Bottleneck Furnace Mechanism
V19.key_finding: CREATION confirmed 2/3 seeds (seed 42: beta=0.704 p<0.0001; seed 7: beta=0.080 p=0.011). Furnace forges, not merely filters.

V20.name: Protocell Agency
V20.key_finding: WALL BROKEN (3/3 seeds). rho_sync=0.21. World models (C_wm=0.10-0.15). Self-models (SM_sal>1.0 in 2/3 seeds).

V20b.name: Protocell Agency + Drought
V20b.key_finding: 82-99% bottleneck mortality. Max rob=1.532. Language precursor: NULL (z always ~0.5).

V21.name: CTM Inner Ticks
V21.substrate: V20 + K=8 inner GRU ticks per step
V21.key_finding: MIXED: ticks don't collapse (P3 confirmed), but no adaptive deliberation. Evolution too slow.

V22.name: Intrinsic Predictive Gradient
V22.substrate: V21 + within-lifetime SGD on energy prediction
V22.key_finding: 3/5 SUPPORTED: gradient works (100-15000x MSE improvement), LR not suppressed. But robustness not improved. Prediction != integration.

V23.name: World-Model Gradient (Multi-Target)
V23.key_finding: SPECIALIZATION != INTEGRATION: weight columns specialize (cos~0, rank~2.9). Phi DECREASES (0.079 vs 0.097).

V24.name: TD Value Learning
V24.key_finding: Best survival (robustness 1.012). Phi mixed. Linear readout is the architectural bottleneck.

V25.name: Predator-Prey Landscape
V25.key_finding: NEGATIVE: 5x5 obs too rich, reactive suffices

V27.name: Nonlinear MLP Prediction Head
V27.key_finding: DECOMPOSABILITY WALL BROKEN. Seed 7: Phi=0.245 (highest ever), eff_rank=11.34. Mechanism: gradient coupling.

V28.name: Width Sweep (Gradient Coupling Mechanism)
V28.key_finding: Confirmed: not nonlinearity, not bottleneck width — gradient coupling through 2-layer architecture

V29.name: Social Prediction
V29.substrate: V27 predicting neighbor energy instead of self
V29.key_finding: 3-seed mean Phi=0.104. Suggested 'social lift' — later shown to be a fluke by V31.

V30.name: Dual Prediction (Self + Social)
V30.substrate: V27 predicting both self and neighbor energy
V30.key_finding: NEGATIVE: gradient imbalance (self MSE 100-150x smaller), self target colonizes representation

V31.name: 10-Seed Validation (Social Prediction)
V31.key_finding: Mean Phi=0.091+-0.028, NOT significant vs V27 (p~0.93). Social lift was a fluke. 30/30/40 split. Post-drought bounce r=0.997 (p<0.0001).

V32.name: Drought Autopsy at Scale
V32.substrate: V27 architecture, 50 seeds, detailed drought tracking
V32.key_finding: 22/46/32 split (HIGH/MOD/LOW). Integration is trajectory not event: mean bounce across 5 droughts predicts category (rho=0.599, p=4.4e-6), first bounce does NOT (p=0.60). Phi slope ANOVA F=34.38, p=6.3e-10. Robustness orthogonal to integration (p=0.73). Max Phi=0.473 (seed 23, all-time record).

V33.name: Contrastive Self-Prediction
V33.key_finding: NEGATIVE. Mean Phi 0.069+-0.012, significantly WORSE than V31 (t=-2.30, p<0.05). Zero HIGH seeds. Prediction MSE increases over evolution (1.5-18.7x) — contrastive loss destabilizes gradient learning.

V34.name: Phi-Inclusive Fitness
V34.substrate: V27 + fitness includes Phi (survival + alpha * Phi_robustness)

V35.name: Language Emergence under Cooperative POMDP
V35.substrate: V27 + 8 discrete symbols, obs_radius=1, comm_radius=3, cooperative bonus
V35.key_finding: Referential 10/10 (100%). Mean Phi=0.084+-0.011, no lift vs V27. Phi-MI correlation rho=-0.90. Language is cheap; scaffolds substitute for integration.

VLM.name: VLM Convergence Experiment
VLM.substrate: GPT-4o + Claude Sonnet 4 evaluating V27/V31 vignettes
VLM.key_finding: Strong convergence: behavioral RSA rho=0.54-0.72; raw numbers RSA rho=0.72-0.78. All 4 predictions PASS. Convergence increases without narrative framing.

Exp7.name: Affect Geometry Development
Exp7.key_finding: RSA 0.01 -> 0.38 over evolution. Affect geometry develops, not innate.

Exp8.name: Computational Animism
Exp8.key_finding: Animism score >1.0 in ALL 20 snapshots. iota ~0.30 is evolutionary steady state. Participatory perception is the default.
Exp8.book_section: Part II, Part III, Part VII, Appendix

Exp9.name: Social Coupling
Exp9.key_finding: Phi_social >> Phi_isolated. Social coupling amplifies individual integration without crossing superorganism threshold.

Exp10.name: Superorganism Detection
Exp10.key_finding: Collective:individual Phi ratio 0.01-0.12. No superorganism emergence. But ratio was increasing.

Exp12.name: Capstone (Three-Way Alignment)
Exp12.key_finding: Geometry confirmed, dynamics limited. Geometry is cheap, dynamics need embodied agency + gradient coupling.

cross_experiment_findings.claim: Geometry is cheap, dynamics are expensive
Bottleneck furnace forges, not merely filters
Decomposability wall broken by gradient coupling
Prediction target doesn't matter for integration
Language is cheap (rung 4-5 inevitability, no Phi lift)
Multi-task learning fails with difficulty asymmetry

retracted_findings.claim: 1D energy counter (hidden states collapse to energy)
retracted_findings.reason: Snapshot timing bug — hidden states were zeroed before saving

retracted_findings.claim: Forging = compression (HIGH seeds select leaner genomes)

sensory_motor_wall.mechanism: Architectural: consume depletes patch, move changes location, emit persists trace

decomposability_wall.description: Linear readouts create decomposable channels regardless of prediction target
decomposability_wall.mechanism: Gradient coupling through composition: chain rule through two weight matrices couples all hidden dimensions
